snippet: Justice Sonia Sotomayor’s perplexing decision to issue a stay on enforcing the rules of the contraception mandate should be lifted.
abstract: Editorial urges Supreme Court Justice Sonia Sotomayor and her colleagues to lift temporary stay on enforcing the rules of the contraception mandate, part of health care reform law; contends suits filed against the mandate boil down to an unjustified attempt by an employer to impose its religious views on its workers.
lead_paragraph: Justice Sonia Sotomayor’s perplexing decision to issue a stay on enforcing the rules of the contraception mandate should be lifted.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
